scripts.api:default-rename: sed -i 's/ApiConfiguration/TododelooApiConfiguration/g' src/app/tododeloo.api/api-configuration.ts && mv src/app/tododeloo.api/api-configuration.ts src/app/tododeloo.api/tododeloo-api-configuration.ts && sed -i 's/ApiConfiguration/TododelooApiConfiguration/g' src/app/tododeloo.api/api.module.ts && sed -i 's/api-configuration/tododeloo-api-configuration/g' src/app/tododeloo.api/api.module.ts && sed -i 's/ApiModule/TododelooApiModule/g' src/app/tododeloo.api/api.module.ts && mv src/app/tododeloo.api/api.module.ts src/app/tododeloo.api/tododeloo-api.module.ts && sed -i 's/ApiConfiguration/TododelooApiConfiguration/g' src/app/tododeloo.api/base-service.ts && sed -i 's/api-configuration/tododeloo-api-configuration/g' src/app/tododeloo.api/base-service.ts && sed -i 's/BaseService/TododelooBaseService/g' src/app/tododeloo.api/base-service.ts && mv src/app/tododeloo.api/base-service.ts src/app/tododeloo.api/tododeloo-base-service.ts && mv src/app/tododeloo.api/models.ts src/app/tododeloo.api/tododeloo-models.ts && mv src/app/tododeloo.api/services.ts src/app/tododeloo.api/tododeloo-services.ts && sed -i 's/ApiConfiguration/TododelooApiConfiguration/g' src/app/tododeloo.api/services/*.ts && sed -i 's/api-configuration/tododeloo-api-configuration/g' src/app/tododeloo.api/services/*.ts && sed -i 's/BaseService/TododelooBaseService/g' src/app/tododeloo.api/services/*.ts && sed -i 's/base-service/tododeloo-base-service/g' src/app/tododeloo.api/services/*.ts
scripts.api:meta-rename: sed -i 's/ApiConfiguration/TododelooMetaApiConfiguration/g' src/app/tododeloo.meta.api/api-configuration.ts && mv src/app/tododeloo.meta.api/api-configuration.ts src/app/tododeloo.meta.api/tododeloo-meta-api-configuration.ts && sed -i 's/ApiConfiguration/TododelooMetaApiConfiguration/g' src/app/tododeloo.meta.api/api.module.ts && sed -i 's/api-configuration/tododeloo-meta-api-configuration/g' src/app/tododeloo.meta.api/api.module.ts && sed -i 's/ApiModule/TododelooMetaApiModule/g' src/app/tododeloo.meta.api/api.module.ts && mv src/app/tododeloo.meta.api/api.module.ts src/app/tododeloo.meta.api/tododeloo-meta-api.module.ts && sed -i 's/ApiConfiguration/TododelooMetaApiConfiguration/g' src/app/tododeloo.meta.api/base-service.ts && sed -i 's/api-configuration/tododeloo-meta-api-configuration/g' src/app/tododeloo.meta.api/base-service.ts && sed -i 's/BaseService/TododelooMetaBaseService/g' src/app/tododeloo.meta.api/base-service.ts && mv src/app/tododeloo.meta.api/base-service.ts src/app/tododeloo.meta.api/tododeloo-meta-base-service.ts && mv src/app/tododeloo.meta.api/models.ts src/app/tododeloo.meta.api/tododeloo-meta-models.ts && mv src/app/tododeloo.meta.api/services.ts src/app/tododeloo.meta.api/tododeloo-meta-services.ts && sed -i 's/ApiConfiguration/TododelooMetaApiConfiguration/g' src/app/tododeloo.meta.api/services/*.ts && sed -i 's/api-configuration/tododeloo-meta-api-configuration/g' src/app/tododeloo.meta.api/services/*.ts && sed -i 's/BaseService/TododelooMetaBaseService/g' src/app/tododeloo.meta.api/services/*.ts && sed -i 's/base-service/tododeloo-meta-base-service/g' src/app/tododeloo.meta.api/services/*.ts
scripts.update:cli: rm -rf node_modules dist && npm install --save-dev @angular/cli@latest && npm install
